text: The Pseudomonadales are an order of Proteobacteria. They are gram-negative. Some species can cause diseases, they are pathogen. For example, Pseudomonas aeruginosa can cause sepsis. Azomonas and Azotobacter are able to fix nitrogen. == Systematics == There are two families: The Moraxellaceae and Pseudomonadaceae.J.P. title: Pseudomonadales
